thread.title: A Denver anchor is one of the top 5 hottest news anchors in the world (according to Buzzfeed)
thread.title_full: A Denver anchor is one of the top 5 hottest news anchors in the world (according to Buzzfeed)

author: The Know
title: A Denver anchor is one of the top 5 hottest news anchors in the world (according to Buzzfeed)
text:
Chris Berman changing role at ESPN 
Someone had the tough job of filtering through all of the submissions, the site then ranked them and today published The 50 Hottest News Anchors In The World . 
In the top 5? Denver’s very own Kyle Clark of 9News. What makes him hot according to Buzzfeed? “He has a shelter dog with an underbite, named Porter.” 
He is so proud of the honor, he joked that he is mailing a copy to his grandma. How sweet. I am going to print this out and mail it to my Grandma. #HeyNext #9News https://t.co/CpPIUrPKaU 
— Kyle Clark (@KyleClark) February 17, 2017 
Also on the list at 17 is KDVR’s Greg Dutra because”He has been described as a ‘prolific home-brewer.'” 
He, on the other hand, is probably not sending a copy to nana.
